name: SentinelOne Hash Blacklister
author: Joe Vasquez
description: Add SHA1 hash to SentinelOne Blacklist via API v2.1.

configurationItems.name: s1_api_key
configurationItems.description: API Key, don't forget this will expire!

configurationItems.name: s1_blacklist_ostype
configurationItems.description: OS type, must be one of the following: macos, windows, linux, or windows_legacy.  Default is windows
